name: Elementals: Calm Skies
description:
Elementals: Calm Skies is a fast turn-based dungeon crawling game.
Travel by ship to the many floating islands in the open spaces of Calm Skies. Dungeon crawl through the many different biomes with a mixture of procedurally generated and handcrafted levels and face off against the diverse range of enemy elementals that cause havoc within them. Utilise the many elemental based attacks to make it out in one piece with all of your belongings. Collect and use special items that can turn the tide of a battle. Once you have the money, why not settle down and own a house? Collect blueprints for furniture which you can use to place down inside your house. Make it look the way you want it to.

*Note: Elementals: calm skies is being developed by one developer.
